reviewtext: My new computer has no 3.5 inch floppy drive, but I still have several such floppy disks with data I wanted to retrieve.  This disk drive read the floppies just fine so I could save the data directly to the computer.This drive is a little slow, but it gets the job done.  For the price, it's a great and very useful buy!
summary: USB External 3.5-Inch 1.44 MB Floppy Disk Drive (white)
